author: danielf
msg: Letting our environment abstractions extend the http servlet set of interfaces according to vote http://marc.info/?t=118623278200002&r=1&w=2.

Part 3: updating back incompatibilities in blocks. In most cases I use javax.servlet.http.Cookie instead of our own Cookies and HttpServlet instead of Servlet inside the code. In a few cases where API:s would have needed to be updated or when larger changes would have been needed I used down casting to Servlet respectively getCocoonCookie instead. Also needed to let a couple of poms depend on the servlet api.
